leaving some people believe that the

Montreal environmental analysis firm

an artificial Christmas tree would have
to be used about 21 years running in
order to have less impact in the

generate oxygen they create habitat for
birds and other animals and they fix

artificial trees on the other hand are
made out of metal and plastic mostly in
Asia and they can't be recycled and so
most of them will ultimately end up in a
landfill also the carbon emissions
associated with a real tree are just
one-third of those that come from making
an artificial tree and transporting it
to the United States ultimately experts
say that the impact of a real or an
artificial tree is actually pretty
